snippet: The brutal slaying of the woman, Kepari Leniata, 20, on Wednesday has been condemned by the nation’s prime minister and foreign diplomats.
lead_paragraph: The brutal slaying of the woman, Kepari Leniata, 20, on Wednesday has been condemned by the nation’s prime minister and foreign diplomats.

headline.main: Woman Accused of Witchcraft Is Killed in Papua New Guinea
headline.print_headline: Papua New Guinea: Woman Accused of Witchcraft Is Killed
